org.apache.http.conn.params
类 ConnManagerParamBean

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.params.HttpAbstractParamBean
      org.apache.http.conn.params.ConnManagerParamBean

public class ConnManagerParamBean
extends HttpAbstractParamBean

Allows for setting parameters relating to connection managers on HttpParams. This class ensures that the values set on the params are type-safe.
